name: Hazzy (Beta)
description:
3D infinite running Game with pleasant music available for Android devices.

Currently I am learning game development courses and this is my first own 3D game created using Unity.

Still it is  in development stage so if you guys face any issues, let me know through the comments.

I will try to make this game more interesting in future updates.

follow my page and support.

Thank you,

Credits,

S.Manoj
